{!Today}
CUST ID No. {!Contact.Client_Id__c} ATTN: [Inspector]
Contact Name:
Contact Address:
APPROVAL OF PETITION FOR VARIANCE
SITE:
[Site Address]
FOR: Petition for Variance
The submittal described above has been reviewed for equivalency to applicable Wisconsin Administrative Codes and compliance with Wisconsin Statutes. The submittal has been CONDITIONALLY APPROVED. The owner, as defined in section 101.01(10), Wisconsin Statutes, is responsible for compliance with all conditions of this petition approval and other applicable code requirements. Plan submittal to and approval by the department or its agent may be necessary prior to construction undertaken per this petition. This petition approval may be affected if applicable codes are revised prior to plan submittal for any necessary construction work.
The code section petitioned requires [Requirements]
The variance requested is to [Variance]
The intent of the code section petitioned [Petition Intent]
The petitioner submitted [Submissions]
Reviewer's Comments:
Departmental Action: CONDITIONAL APPROVAL
Reviewer's Conditions of Approval/Recommendations:
This decision will become final unless the department within 30 days from the date of this letter receives a written request for a hearing. A request for hearing should be sent to the address shown on this letterhead. A copy of this letter must be included with the request for a hearing. The request for hearing should state the reasons for objecting to the department's decision, because a request for hearing may be denied if it does not present a significant question in fact, law or policy.
Inquiries concerning this correspondence may be made to me at the telephone number listed below, or at the address on this letterhead.
Sincerely,
